archimate:Goal.name: Establish Self-Service Provisioning Capability
archimate:Goal.documentation:
This is what we need to do according to Michael Lenahan in the Tech Services All-Hands Call 2023-06-01.
Self-service provisioning refers to the ability of users, often developers or other technical staff within an organization, to independently provision or manage their own computing resources without the need for direct intervention from IT operations. This is typically facilitated through a portal or interface where users can select, configure, and manage their own virtual machines, containers, applications, databases, or other digital resources.
